title: Installer stuck at 34%/36%
body:
Dear all,

After trying numberous attempts to fix this issue, such as deleting certain files, moving them from one place to another, deleting the complete application and reinstalling, I still have the same issue that the game wonâ€™t install past 36%. If I restart the installation, I keep having the same issue, where the installation gets stuck and then freezes the whole computer. The specifications are all up to scratch so please could someone provide me with a solution or some form of information.

Thank you very much!

replies.body:
Getting stuck at this phase of the installation can indicate an issue with your connection reaching the patching server.  Make sure you have enough space on your drive, then check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that nothing is blocking you from getting those updates.

There's a chance as well that your security settings are contributing to that block.  Just to be safe, our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help make sure League is being added as an exception so it can install files without issue.
